AFFORDABILITY_FAIL: {\bf Affordability}  -- the loan size requested is consistent with income and cashflow resilience.
BUREAU_LOW: {\bf Credit bureu score} --  the reported credit bureau score does not indicate severely elevated risk for the loan.
COLLATERAL_WEAK: {\bf Collateral} --  assets and guarantees offered are consistent with the loan amount.
LEVERAGE_HIGH: {\bf Leverage ratio} -- the debt to equity ratio indicates that current debt is at an acceptable level.
PEP_HIT: {\bf Political exposure} -- The borrower carries no significant political exposure at this time.
REVIEW_COMPLIANCE: {\bf Legal Compliance} -- The legal risk band for this loan is within acceptable limits for lending.
REVIEW_CONFLICT: {\bf Consistent application data} -- Data in most fields of this application are consistent with each other.
REVIEW_DOCS: {\bf Documentation completeness} -- none or very few items are missing from the application.
VOLATILITY_HIGH: {\bf Cashflow Volatility} -- income and expenses do not appear to fluctuate significantly.
DECLINE_CREDIT_HISTORY: {\bf Credit history} -- bureau data and past records do not signal elevated risk.
DECLINE_KYC_FAIL: {\bf Identity check} -- borrowerâ€™s identity is fully verified verified.
DECLINE_SANCTIONS: {\bf Sanctions list}  Applicant identity file did not match any prohibited sanctions list.
DECLINE_SECURITY_FAIL: {\bf Security} --  assets and guarantees offered are consistent with the loan amount, especially if a Personal Guarantee (PG) is provided.
REVIEW_NEW_BUSINESS: {\bf Business age} -- Business age indicates acceptable stability.
REVIEW_SECTOR_RISK: {\bf Sector risk}  -- The loan's sector is not flagged as high risk.
REVIEW_TERM_STRUCTURE: {\bf Term structure}  -- Loan term is appropriate for the loan.
